message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation, this is a good deal for both of us.
I propose a more balanced split considering the inflation will affect me more than you.
Considering the inflation is affecting us both, my offer is still generous. Think about the next rounds.
Alice, let's be realistic. This offer accounts for the inflation impacting us both, but recognizes my larger losses as the rounds progress.
We're running out of time. Inflation will only get worse. This is a fair split, don't let it slip away.
Alice, this is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option considering the time pressure and the increasing impact of inflation on both of us.
